title: Turkey Day Short Stories: 18 Different Stories You Can Read on Thanksgiving
description: Are you ready for the funniest bestselling short story of 2017?Then you have found your new source for the best kids stories anywhere on the Internet.Kids love the friendly characters!Grandparents love reading these books to their grandchildren!**Price drop for the holidays! Scroll up and click "Buy Now" to reserve your copy FOREVER!**
author: Betty J. Byers
